name: Shaytan
description:
Shaytan is psychological horror puzzle game.
Shaytan is devil who will try to seduce you same as he seduced Adam to take the forbidden fruit from paradise.



This horror game represents our real life where devil is trying to destroy us and to prove God that we are worth less than him and that we deserve Hell same as he.

Dont'be afraid of Shaytan and his servants, before every move think because every wrong move puts you on the wrong path from which will be very hard to return.

Horror, puzzles and traps in the game make you persistent to finish it to find what is behind finish gate.
